title: Thomas Keller, Founder Thomas Keller Restaurant Group
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Thomas Keller, founder of the Thomas Keller Restaurant Group. Harris also speaks with Sculptor Andy Goldsworthy.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Thomas Keller, founder of the Thomas Keller Restaurant Group. Harris also speaks with Sculptor Andy Goldsworthy.
